description: Gets a list of HyperParameterTuningJobSummary objects that describe the hyperparameter tuning jobs launched in your account.

nested_items.name: HyperParameterTuningJobSummaries
nested_items.description: A list of HyperParameterTuningJobSummary objects that describe the tuning jobs that the ListHyperParameterTuningJobs request returned.

nested_items.name: HyperParameterTuningJobName
nested_items.description: The name of the tuning job.

nested_items.name: HyperParameterTuningJobArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the tuning job.

nested_items.name: HyperParameterTuningJobStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the tuning job.

nested_items.name: Strategy
nested_items.description: Specifies the search strategy hyperparameter tuning uses to choose which hyperparameters to evaluate at each iteration.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: The date and time that the tuning job was created.

nested_items.name: HyperParameterTuningEndTime
nested_items.description: The date and time that the tuning job ended.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedTime
nested_items.description: The date and time that the tuning job was modified.

nested_items.name: TrainingJobStatusCounters
nested_items.description: The TrainingJobStatusCounters object that specifies the numbers of training jobs, categorized by status, that this tuning job launched.

nested_items.name: Completed
nested_items.description: The number of completed training jobs launched by the hyperparameter tuning job.

nested_items.name: InProgress
nested_items.description: The number of in-progress training jobs launched by a hyperparameter tuning job.

nested_items.name: RetryableError
nested_items.description: The number of training jobs that failed, but can be retried. A failed training job can be retried only if it failed because an internal service error occurred.

nested_items.name: NonRetryableError
nested_items.description: The number of training jobs that failed and can't be retried. A failed training job can't be retried if it failed because a client error occurred.

nested_items.name: Stopped
nested_items.description: The number of training jobs launched by a hyperparameter tuning job that were manually stopped.

nested_items.name: ObjectiveStatusCounters
nested_items.description: The ObjectiveStatusCounters object that specifies the numbers of training jobs, categorized by objective metric status, that this tuning job launched.

nested_items.name: Succeeded
nested_items.description: The number of training jobs whose final objective metric was evaluated by the hyperparameter tuning job and used in the hyperparameter tuning process.

nested_items.name: Pending
nested_items.description: The number of training jobs that are in progress and pending evaluation of their final objective metric.

nested_items.name: Failed
nested_items.description: The number of training jobs whose final objective metric was not evaluated and used in the hyperparameter tuning process. This typically occurs when the training job failed or did not emit an objective metric.

nested_items.name: ResourceLimits
nested_items.description: The ResourceLimits object that specifies the maximum number of training jobs and parallel training jobs allowed for this tuning job.

nested_items.name: MaxNumberOfTrainingJobs
nested_items.description: The maximum number of training jobs that a hyperparameter tuning job can launch.

nested_items.name: MaxParallelTrainingJobs
nested_items.description: The maximum number of concurrent training jobs that a hyperparameter tuning job can launch.

nested_items.name: MaxRuntimeInSeconds
nested_items.description: The maximum time in seconds that a hyperparameter tuning job can run.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: If the result of this ListHyperParameterTuningJobs request was truncated, the response includes a NextToken. To retrieve the next set of tuning jobs, use the token in the next request.
